name: Arithmetic
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math exercise
des:
Exercise your basic arithmetic skills by solving a variety of math problems. Alexa will ask you questions like:

• What is 2 + 3?
• What is 4 - 2 + 5?
• What is 9 ÷ 3 × 8 + 11?

You’ll start off with simple addition and subtraction, and the problems will gradually get longer and more difficult the more you answer correctly. Challenge yourself by getting as many correct answers in a row as you can!
